title: Mobile Language Competency Enhancement Course Based on Personalized Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with job-integrated language education for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately produce ≥10 workplace-relevant key expressions reflecting job contexts
Learners complete 2 hours/week of personalized content at their own learning pace
Learners correct language errors ≥3 times through real-time peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
